intro: Ganesh Hostel is located in Subidhanagar, Tinkune, Kathmandu .Ganesh Hostel focuses on preparing the family type environment with satisfactory facilities like 24 hrs Electricity & WiFi, Attached Showers, locker room, Parking Spaces, hygienic food, laundry services etc.
